alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 10:05AM EST until January 18 at 8:30PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville affecting Pulaski and Bleckley Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at US 341 at Hawkinsville. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, Minor flooding of roads continues on the south side of Hawkinsville, along Gooseneck Lane. Water continues to inundate Gooseneck Lane, cutting off access to homes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Sunday the stage was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.7 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 20 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1015 PM EST.
